description: Scale ca. 1:25,000. Shows rivers in Song Xian, Henan Sheng. Cover title. Manuscript on silk. Labels pasted on to show physical features. Imperfect: Text incomplete. Oriented with north to the bottom. Relief shown pictorially. Pictorial map. Hummel purchase 1934, no. 29. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Includes text. Previous call number: G7823.S7C3 1767 .S6 Vault Shelf AACR2: 700/1

medium: col. map 90 x 90 cm. fold. in cover 32 x 16 cm.
